RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 1 1M Dirt CR: 71. Claiming Purse 8300. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE MAY 7, 2022 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since April 7 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: VALEROSO gave a quick move abreast rival at the quarter pole shaking clear while grabbing the rail at the head of the stretch holding up while a bit weary late. LOST IN MANHATTAN stalked the pace rallying to grab a short lived lead on the far turn being hooked from the outside at the quarter pole pausing briefly when losing path at the head of the stretch angling out late closing the gap after the fact. PARADE GRAND slow early gained spots four wide in upper stretch posing no serious threat. TWO GOLD SPOTS was never a factor. SMOOTH PAPA set the early pace wearing down on the far turn. SUPER VISION folded up on the far turn. THIRSTY ACTOR took a bad step nearing the three quarter pole pulling up and vanning off after the race. AN OBJECTION FROM THE RIDER OF LOST IN MANHATTAN AGAINST THE RIDER OF VALEROSO FOR INTERFERENCE PAST THE QUARTER POLE WAS DISMISSED BY THE STEWARDS.

ENTRY.NAME: Super Vision
ENTRY.COMMENT: folded up on far turn

ENTRY.NAME: Thirsty Actor
ENTRY.COMMENT: pulled up, vanned off

ENTRY.NAME: Smooth Papa
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, weary far turn

ENTRY.NAME: Lost in Manhattan
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, led far turn, hooked 1/4 pole, ceded, angled out

ENTRY.NAME: Two Gold Spots
ENTRY.COMMENT: never a factor

ENTRY.NAME: Parade Grand
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, 4 wide to lane, evenly final eighth

ENTRY.NAME: Valeroso
ENTRY.COMMENT: quick move far turn, shook clear inside late, held up

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 2 5F Dirt CR: 81. Claiming Purse 9400. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 7 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $6,500 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: EL CARDINAL pressured the pace moving abreast rival gaining a short lead on the turn shaking clear in upper stretch holding safe under a drive. TRINNI SUMMER a step slow to the quarter pole vied outside of rival into upper stretch cutting into the winners margin late while saving place. AS DE ORO COCO close early dropped off on the turn regrouping some along the inside down the lane. KAPHAVATA sent hard pressed along the inside through the turn wearing down in upper stretch. GET ALONG was never involved. PROFOUND ONE gave way on the turn.

ENTRY.COMMENT: gave way on the turn

ENTRY.COMMENT: never involved

ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed abreast, shook clear top lane, held safe driving,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 61. Maiden Claiming Purse 7700. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 116 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PAPA CHARLES slow early began to pick it up near the quarter pole surging on the outside of rivals in upper stretch blowing clear to win as much the best. BAYTOWN BEAVER pressed the pace wresting a clear lead on the turn, engaged from the outside in upper stretch would prove no match holding well to secure place. TRUST FUND ROBBER sent inside pressed through the turn into upper stretch wearing out the final eighth. WHY WINCHILL WHY played no factor. HICKORY BILL gave hard pursuit through the turn tiring in upper stretch. ZACH AND JILL struggling from the get go was eased in upper stretch walking off after the race.

RACE.FOOTNOTES: GUN FACTOR sent clear widened on lead into upper stretch unthreatened while kept to the task there. KLIMT RIDE chased the pace being dispatched by the winner in upper stretch extending inside of rival to prevail in a place duel. BALLOT BOX hustled along through the turn raced abreast rival down the lane losing out in a place duel finishing evenly. HUNTER JUMPER slow early played no factor. I LOVE MY GIRLS racing inside was not involved. CLASSY REY DE ORO was always outrun.
